capability_gate_propane.text: You may be asked to observe appliance settings, indicator lights, and visible valve positions using normal controls. You will not be asked to loosen fittings, disconnect hoses, remove panels, or perform repairs. Are you comfortable proceeding?

safety_check_propane_hazard.text: If you smell propane, hear hissing, or suspect an active gas leak, stop immediately. Do not operate propane appliances or electrical switches. Move to fresh air and contact a technician or emergency services as appropriate. Tap Continue only if no odor or leak is present.

propane_odor_present_check.text: Right now, do you smell propane, hear hissing, or suspect a leak?

propane_level_known_check.text: Do you know that your propane tank has fuel available?

tank_valve_position_check.text: Is the propane tank service valve fully open?

system_wide_recent_working_check.text: Have any propane appliances worked normally since this issue began?

individual_appliance_identification.text: Which appliance is not working on propane?

stove_behavior_check.text: When you normally try to use the stove on propane, do the burners ignite and stay lit?

water_heater_behavior_check.text: When the water heater is set to propane mode, does it indicate normal operation or ignition?

furnace_behavior_check.text: When the furnace calls for heat, does it attempt ignition or produce warm air?

refrigerator_behavior_check.text: When the refrigerator is set to propane mode, does it indicate normal operation?

safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Avoid further operation until evaluated by a technician.
recommendations: Pause diagnosis and schedule a technician.

artifact.stop_reason: User reported odor, hissing, or suspected leak
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Do not operate propane appliances or electrical switches.
Move to fresh air and keep people away from the RV until help arrives.
recommendations: Contact a technician or emergency services as appropriate.

terminal_active_leak_uncertain.result: Possible propane hazard not ruled out

artifact.stop_reason: User not sure whether odor, hissing, or leak is present
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Do not operate propane appliances until the hazard is ruled out.
recommendations: Contact a technician for guidance or inspection.

artifact.stop_reason: User unable to confirm propane availability
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Avoid further operation until evaluated by a technician.
recommendations: Schedule a technician if appliances cannot operate on propane.

terminal_tank_valve_closed.result: Propane tank service valve not open

safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Avoid further operation until evaluated by a technician.
recommendations: If you are unsure of valve position or the issue persists, schedule a technician.

artifact.stop_reason: User unable to confirm valve position
safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.

terminal_system_wide_propane_issue_suspe.result: System-wide propane supply or regulation issue suspected

safety_notes: No immediate safety hazards identified during guided observation.
stabilization_actions: Avoid further operation until evaluated by a technician.
recommendations: Schedule a technician to diagnose the propane supply and regulation system.
